definition: Lewin (name)/Kurt Lewin (1890-1944), German-American psychologist of the Gestalt school known for his field theory of behavior
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]

sentences.english: Lewin focused on motivation and the motivational concepts that underlie an individual's behavior.
sentences.chinese: 盧因關注基於個人行爲的動機和有關動機的概念。
